message: Let's start fair. I'll take 60, you take 40.  We can work out a better deal in the next round if you want.
I think we should switch places from the last round. This seems fairer to me.  What do you say?
I understand you want a bigger share. Let's meet in the middle.  I'll take 55, you take 45.  If we keep rejecting each other, we'll both get less in the end!
